card.text: Cook and Eat deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it would die this turn, instead exile it, then tap any number of untapped creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.

card.name: Enchanted Summer
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced. At the end of your turn, transform Enchanted Summer. --- (Back): Enchanted Winter

card.name: Enchanted Winter
card.text: Players can’t untap more than one land during their untap steps. At the end of your turn, transform Enchanted Winter. --- (Front): Enchanted Summer

card.name: Luton, Usurper King
card.text: Creatures you control but don’t own get +1/+1 and have hexproof, haste and menace. When Luton enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature.

card.name: Gaheris, Oathbound
card.text: First strike, vigilance, menace Whenever Gaheris attacks, you may return target Knight creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Janjahar the All-Consuming
card.text: [+3]: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. [+2]: Destroy target land. [+1]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Kath, Young Adventurer
card.text: Haste Whenever Kath deals damage to a Quest, transform Kath. --- (Back): Kath, Veteran Adventurer

card.name: Kath, Veteran Adventurer
card.text: Double strike, prowess When Kath leaves the battlefield, return all Quest cards from your graveyard to your hand. --- (Front): Kath, Young Adventurer

card.name: Esmet, Faerie Queen
card.text: Flash Flying, deathtouch Other Faeries you control have deathtouch. Whenever a Faerie you control deals combat damage to an opponent, exile the top card of your library. If it’s a Faerie, instant, or sorcery card, put it into your hand.

card.name: Nameless God of Crawling Things
card.text: Indestructible, deathtouch Nameless God of Crawling Things can’t attack or block unless you control at least two Insects, Leeches, Scorpions, Slugs, Spiders, and/or Worms. Insects, Leeches, Scorpions, Slugs, Spiders, and Worms you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Nathalie, Heretic Priestess
card.text: Each creature you control is paired with each other creature you control.

card.name: Uya, Phelddagrif Queen
card.text: G: Uya gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Ouphe Hippo creature token. W: Uya gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. U: Uya gains flying and hexproof until end of turn. Target opponent draws a card.

card.name: Sword of Kings

card.text: Slumbering Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. T: Add R. 3RRR, T: Transform Slumbering Volcano. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. --- (Back): Mount Reviroa

card.text: (T: Add R.) When this card transforms into Mount Reviroa, it deals 4 damage to each creature and planeswalker. T: Add RRR. Mount Reviroa deals 3 damage to you. --- (Front): Slumbering Volcano

[0]: Until end of turn, Vasilisa Ilyina becomes a 5/5 Dinosaur creature with indestructible, haste, and trample. card.name: Magnificent Heist
card.text: Look at the top six cards of target opponent’s library, exile two of them, and put the rest into their owner’s graveyard. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled and may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to do so.

card.text: When Lady of the Lake enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment or Quest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Merchant Prince

card.text: Holy Fire deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

card.text: Flying If Children of the Nameless God would deal damage to a creature, you may instead search your library and graveyard for a card named Tyrant’s Mark and put it onto the battlefield attached to that creature. If you do, shuffle. --- (Front): Tyrant's Mark
